resources.string: Comic Selector: Select which comic strip to view.
First Comic: Navigate to the first comic in the currently selected strip, in chronological order.
Previous Comic: Navigate to the previous comic in the currently selected strip.
Random Comic: Navigate to a random comic in the currently selected strip. (Not available for all comic strips)
Next Comic Navigate to the next comic in the currently selected strip.
Latest Comic Navigate to the latest (most recent) comic in the currently selected strip.
Favorite: Mark the current comic as favorite; favorite comics can later be accessed from the List menu option.
Save: Save the current comic for offline vieweing. Saved comics can later be accessed from the List menu option.
Bookmark: Bookmark the current comic; every comic strip can have a single bookmark. Bookmarking another comic in the same strip overwrites the previous bookmark.
Last Viewed: Navigate to the last viewed comic. (Irregardless of strip)
Bookmark (Navigate): Navigate to the bookmarked comic in the currently selected strip.
